[i]Engage![/i] – {B}{G}{U} [i](You may put this card under another legendary creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
[i]Other Half[/i] – Whenever Robin, Emblem of Bonds engages or another nontoken creature you control enters, look at the top three cards of your library. Put a card from among them into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
